me aramuna athiwa unwahanse athin liyawunu bauddhayage athpotha, punyea්padeshaya, suwisi maha gunaya, mangala dhamaj wistharaya, pohoya dinaya, bodhi pujawa, buddha nithi sangrahaya, bodhipakshika dharma wistharaya, paramitha prakaranaya, dharma winishchaya, nirwana winishchaya ha punaruthpaththi kramaya, abhidharmaye mulika karunu, abhidharma margaya, wanychaka dharma ha chiththopaklesha dharma, keles ekdahas pansiya, pattana maha prakarana sannaya, anuwada sahitha abhidharmartha sangrahaya, chathuraya sathyaya, widarshana bhawana kramaya, chaththalisakara maha wipassana bhawanawa, sathipattana bhawana kramaya, sathipattana bhawana wiwechanaya ha wenath kruthi, patichcha samuppada wiwaranaya, shasanawatharanaya, upasampada shilaya, winaya karma potha, anuwada sahitha ubhaya prathimokshaya aadi poth thihak pamana weyi. 1947 di unwahanse liyu poth prathama warata mudranayen eli dakwiya yuthu yayi kalpana kale unwahansege shishya pujya godigamuwe soratha himipano ya. 1954 pamana dakwa me karyya sarthaka kala unwahansege abhawayen pasu shasthrawedi pujya hengoda kalyanadhamma himiyan ema sath kayyata ura dunha.
